author: Paul Waldman
title: The war against the states
description: President Trump and congressional Republicans have decided to extort the states into lifting stay-at-home orders.
content: Last week, the $349 billion allotted for small businesses in the CARES Act rescue package ran out, with only a portion of the American businesses that have suffered in this pandemic-driven recession getting the help they need. While everyone seemed ready to p… [+5463 chars]
